title: Textile, 1943-46-11, 17th century
medium: Silk and metal.  Plain compound cloth, brocaded.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: All-over pattern of small-scale, stylized floral forms brocaded in white silk and silver thread on a ground of blue satin.  Satin ground originally shot through with extra silver (flat metal strips) threads; now almost entirely worn away.
